```
TWAS  Base class for transcriptome-wide association studies
      Holds shared config (approach, region, model weights) and project paths.

   obj = TWAS(project, twas_approach, grex_region)

   Syntax:
       # used via subclasses; no public run method here

   Description:
       Initializes common TWAS metadata:
         • approach (e.g., 'FUS', 'PDX', 'UTM', 'JTI')
         • grex_region (tissue / region label)
         • weight_file resolved from Models.WEIGHT(approach, region)

   Inputs:
       project            Project object providing paths and I/O helpers
       twas_approach      String: 'FUS' | 'PDX' | 'UTM' | 'JTI'
       grex_region        String: tissue/region name

   Outputs:
       TWAS object with:
         • .project, .approach, .grex_region, .weight_file
```
